import { useContext } from "react" import { Button, Card, } from "react-bootstrap" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { UserContext } from "../layouts/Body" const InFor= ()=>{ const [user, dispatch] = useContext(UserContext) return( <>

Họ và tên: {user.last_name} {user.first_name}

Email: {user.email}

 ) } export default InFor
